title: Kelly Brook cuts a chic figure in an oversized white jumper and scarlet satin skirt
text:
She joked she had finally 'got a proper job' as co-host of Heart radio's drive time at the start of this year.

And Kelly Brook cut a striking figure in a red satin skirt with a revealing slit down the front as she left the Global studios in London on Tuesday.

The model, 39, showcased her toned pins as the midi-length skirt billowed in the breeze on her way home.

Heading home: Kelly Brook cut a striking figure in a red satin skirt with a revealing slit down the front as she left the London Heart studios on Tuesday

She teamed the glamorous skirt with an oversized white jumper and accessorised the look by slinging a black bag across her chest.

A pair of nude heels offered a sophisticated finish to the ensemble.

Kelly wore her long brunette hair down, letting her light curls cascade across one shoulder. She enhanced her features with highlighter and a light brown eye shadow.

Beauty: The model, 39, showcased her toned pins as the midi-length skirt billowed in the breeze on her way home

Kelly's appearance comes after the actress gave an insightful interview about her past dating life to MailOnline.

Kelly, who is happily loved-up with beau Jeremy Parisi, said: 'I like to think I'm a loving and open person. But I tended to trust everybody. As I moved into my 30s, I came to realise that was a mistake.

'I'm particularly thinking of members of the opposite sex. I had a series of boyfriends who professed their undying love then cheated on me.'

Sophistication: She teamed the glamorous skirt with an oversized white jumper and accessorised the look by slinging a black bag across her chest

She added: 'I was guilty of giving people the benefit of the doubt, so I wasn't doing enough to protect my own interests. I hope I've always been kind, but you can forget to be kind to yourself.

'Being too nice can rebound on you. Certainly, jealousy can play its part. I think people sometimes want what you've got.'

The brunette bombshell has a slew of famous exes, including Jason Statham, Billy Zane and rugby player Danny Cipriani - who she dumped when she found messages on his phone from other women.

Kelly has been dating Jeremy, 34, since April 2015 when she reached out to him on social media, revealing she 'slipped into his DMs' on Instagram before they met in person.
